title: Tradelous Mobile
extendedDescription: Tradelous is an application developed as a personal project. It provides a practical platform designed to facilitate the control of products and sales for various businesses.

features.name: User Management
features.description: User registration and role management with employer permissions.

features.name: Company Administration
features.description: Company management with employee hiring and dismissal workflows.

features.name: Product Catalog
features.description: Product CRUD operations with barcode scanning integration using camera.
